definition: to keep on saying (idiom); to repeat over and over again
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: He glibly professed his ignorance of the affair.
sentences.chinese: 他口口声声表白不知道这件事。

sentences.english: Proclaiming that satan rules the earth.
sentences.chinese: 口口声声说撒旦规则大地。

sentences.english: Also claim that they are m future son-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 还口口声声说自己才是米家的准女婿。

definition: to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
to have no sense of shame
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions/also written 振振有詞|振振有词
old: to reap the consequences of one's words (idiom, from Mencius); modern: to go back on one's word/to blow hot and cold/to contradict oneself/inconsistent
to lie through one's teeth (idiom)/to talk drivel

definition: to forget favors and violate justice (idiom); ingratitude to a friend/to kick a benefactor in the teeth
to use all sorts of excuses
